item.description:
Great Food! Great Company!
Great Way To Meet New Friends!

Dinner & Drinks: Turtle Soup ( 6pm-8pm )
Located at 113 Ocean Road in the Ocean Rose Inn, this beautiful setting is accented by stunning ocean views and it’s proximity to Narragansett Beach. The restaurant offers fresh seafood, steaks, and pastas with a French and Italian influence.

EXTENDED RSVP: Friday 4;00 pm

Dancing ******* UPDATE *******

Member Choice: Dancing @ The Narragansett Cafe


Tim Taylor Blues Band 9:30 pm - 1:30: The Narragansett Cafe
25 Narragansett Avenue
Jamestown, RI 02835
401-423-2150

Tim’s FABULOUS harmonica and voice, Marlie’s AMAZING and passionate lead guitar, the BEST BLUESY BIG BASS and GREAT keyboards and MASTER DRUMMER all add up to a great blues experience.

Cost: No Cover

* NOTE: If you are interested in joining the group just for dancing please email me your phone number and I will tell you how to find us at the Narragansett Cafe.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess to sit you with the MeetUp Group.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Dinner & Drinks @ Turtle Soup ..... Dancing @ The Narragansett Cafe
